trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Contém propriedades e métodos para fornecer aparência consistente para todos os designers de raiz em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, uma instância de uma classe designer do fluxo de trabalho sequencial raiz é criada quando um fluxo de trabalho é criado em um designer de fluxo de trabalho e representa a superfície do designer em que os usuários podem adicionar e editar atividades.

trans-unit.source: A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de fluxo de trabalho raiz não tem um designer de pai, a menos que ele é o filho de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: All workflow root designers must derive from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os designers de raiz de fluxo de trabalho devem ser derivado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> pode ser definido como o pai da atividade associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the activity associated with <paramref name="parentActivityDesigner" /> to be the parent of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para permitir que a atividade associada a <paramref name="parentActivityDesigner" /> seja pai da atividade associada a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de raiz não podem ter um designer de atividade pai em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanBeParentedTo%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe de herança, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanBeParentedTo%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer pode ser expandido e recolhido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> podem ser expandidos e recolhidos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> is always set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> é sempre definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rodapé associado ao designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> that represents the footer associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> que representa o rodapé associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Footer%2A> appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Footer%2A> aparecem na parte inferior do designer raiz na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e o texto podem ser exibidas no rodapé, incluindo os ícones de botão Alterar o modo de exibição designer quando um usuário seleciona um deles.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> on which to gather the collection of connection points.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> no qual coletar a coleção de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura de pontos que representam a conexão interna do designer.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> objects used for a connectable designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> usados para um designer conectável.

trans-unit.source: A designer can have connectors within it.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode ter conectores dentro dele.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de glifos exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> que contém os glifos exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the header associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cabeçalho associado ao designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> that represents the header associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> que representa o cabeçalho associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> aparecem na parte superior do designer raiz na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e texto podem ser exibidos no cabeçalho, incluindo o texto que indica o modo de exibição designer que está sendo exibido na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> propriedade é definida como o <xref:System.Drawing.Image> para exibir.

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso em tempo de design ou em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor para os limites da imagem associada ao designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> displayed for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que inclui o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> para recuperar as coordenadas para o retângulo que contém a imagem associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas coordenadas para desenhar conectores ou sobreposição de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> é calculado usando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> that requested the sequential workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> que solicitou a inicialização do designer raiz de fluxo de trabalho sequencial.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> que solicitou o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho mínimo para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the minimum size of the sequential workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho mínimo do designer de fluxo de trabalho sequencial.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> represents the smallest size to which a user can resize the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> representa o tamanho do menor para o qual um usuário pode redimensionar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais nos designers contidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the visual cues on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho das indicações visuais no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws any headers and footers associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Desenha quaisquer cabeçalhos e rodapés associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> Desenha um texto para incluir em cabeçalhos e rodapés com as configurações apropriadas do tema.

trans-unit.source: It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: Ele também se baseia as imagens para incluir nos cabeçalhos e rodapés.

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** quando você substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método da classe base, de modo que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display smart tags on the designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para exibir as marcações inteligentes na superfície do designer; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer whether smart tags are to be shown or hidden on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer se as marcações inteligentes devem ser mostradas ou ocultadas no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: When called, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> invalidates the text rectangle associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> invalida o retângulo do texto associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** quando você substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the root designer displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer raiz exibe marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> displays smart tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> exibe marcas inteligentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> propriedade não está definida como uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) e o correspondente <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> propriedade não está vazio de cadeia de caracteres ou definido como uma referência nula (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle on the designer surface in which to display a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo na superfície do designer no qual exibir uma marcação inteligente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds in which to display the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites de exibição de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> at the location specified by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.SmartTagRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> para exibir uma marca inteligente de disponíveis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> no local especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.SmartTagRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a descrição associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a descrição associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Text%2A> returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe de herança, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Text%2A> retorna <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura da área de título do designer.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the height of the title area of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a altura da área de título do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma área de título designer raiz normalmente contém o cabeçalho e qualquer ícone associado com o designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> calcula o número de inteiro retorna obtendo o valor de sua implementação de base e adicionando o inteiro de altura definido para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
